Operation 'get-zipcode' has semantic quality issues: vague_summary, vague_description, missing_output_details. Original summary and description are too generic. Added specificity about what 'details' means (geographic, demographic, administrative data), clarified the input requirement (path parameter), and explained the response structure (Zipcode object with 36 fields) to improve AI agent interpretability.

data.current_description: Gets the details of a single Zip code.
data.summary_suggestion: Retrieve detailed information for a specific zip code
data.description_suggestion: Retrieves comprehensive data for a single U.S. zip code, including geographic, demographic, and administrative information. Requires the zip code as a path parameter. Returns a Zipcode object containing 36 data fields such as city, state, county, latitude, longitude, and population data.
data.reasoning: Original summary and description are too generic. Added specificity about what 'details' means (geographic, demographic, administrative data), clarified the input requirement (path parameter), and explained the response structure (Zipcode object with 36 fields) to improve AI agent interpretability.

message: Operation 'get-zipcodes' has semantic quality issues: vague_description, missing_input_details, missing_output_details, not_actionable. Description lacks actionable details about what the operation does beyond 'returns a list'. Added information about the 16 available parameters for filtering, pagination mechanics, response structure, and authentication requirement. Removed external link reference as it's not helpful for AI agents. This enables agents to understand when and how to use this operation effectively.

data.current_description: Returns a list of zip codes. Results are always paginated. Visit the [Zip Code Data API](https://www.metadapi.com/API-Products/API-Product-Details/zip-code-api) product page for information on how to get an API key.
data.description_suggestion: Retrieves a paginated list of U.S. zip codes with optional filtering and sorting. Supports 16 query parameters for filtering by state, city, county, and other criteria. Results are always paginated with configurable page size and offset. Returns an array of Zipcode objects with metadata about pagination and result count. Requires valid API key authentication.
data.reasoning: Description lacks actionable details about what the operation does beyond 'returns a list'. Added information about the 16 available parameters for filtering, pagination mechanics, response structure, and authentication requirement. Removed external link reference as it's not helpful for AI agents. This enables agents to understand when and how to use this operation effectively.

message: Operation 'get-radius' has semantic quality issues: vague_description, missing_input_details, missing_output_details. Original summary 'Zip Code Radius' is vague and not action-oriented. Description lacks specificity about the 3 parameters and their purpose. Improved summary to clearly indicate the search action. Enhanced description to explain all required parameters, their purpose, the response structure, and use cases to improve AI agent interpretability.

data.current_description: Endpoint that returns the zip codes that fall within the specified radius of another zip code. The returned zip codes are sorted by distance.
data.summary_suggestion: Find zip codes within a specified radius
data.description_suggestion: Performs a radius search to find all U.S. zip codes within a specified distance from a center zip code. Requires 3 parameters: center zip code, radius distance, and distance unit (miles or kilometers). Returns an array of Zipcode objects sorted by distance from the center point, enabling proximity-based queries and geographic analysis.
data.reasoning: Original summary 'Zip Code Radius' is vague and not action-oriented. Description lacks specificity about the 3 parameters and their purpose. Improved summary to clearly indicate the search action. Enhanced description to explain all required parameters, their purpose, the response structure, and use cases to improve AI agent interpretability.

message: Operation 'get-msagroups' has semantic quality issues: vague_description, missing_input_details, missing_output_details. Summary is adequate. Description needs enhancement to clarify the 3 available parameters, pagination support, and the structure of returned data. Added technical accuracy (MSA vs SA terminology) and specified that results include codes, names, states, and counties to help AI agents understand the response structure and filtering capabilities.

data.current_description: This end point lists all the Metropolitan and Micropolitan Statistical Areas in the United States with the corresponding states and counties that make up the group.
data.description_suggestion: Retrieves a paginated list of all Metropolitan Statistical Areas (MSAs) and Micropolitan Statistical Areas (SAs) in the United States. Supports 3 query parameters for filtering and pagination. Returns an array of MSA group objects, each containing the MSA code, name, associated states, and constituent counties. Results are paginated and sortable.
data.reasoning: Summary is adequate. Description needs enhancement to clarify the 3 available parameters, pagination support, and the structure of returned data. Added technical accuracy (MSA vs SA terminology) and specified that results include codes, names, states, and counties to help AI agents understand the response structure and filtering capabilities.

message: Operation 'get-msagroups-msacode' has semantic quality issues: vague_description, missing_output_details. Summary is acceptable but could be more concise. Description is vague about what 'details' includes. Enhanced description to specify the input requirement (MSA code path parameter), clarify the response structure (MSA group object with code, name, states, counties, and demographic data), and use consistent terminology (MSA/SA) to improve AI agent understanding of available data.

data.current_description: Gets the details of a single Metropolitan Statistical Area code passed as a path parameter.
data.description_suggestion: Retrieves detailed information for a single Metropolitan or Micropolitan Statistical Area (MSA/SA) using its MSA code as a path parameter. Returns an MSA group object containing the area code, name, associated states, constituent counties, and related geographic and demographic information.
data.reasoning: Summary is acceptable but could be more concise. Description is vague about what 'details' includes. Enhanced description to specify the input requirement (MSA code path parameter), clarify the response structure (MSA group object with code, name, states, counties, and demographic data), and use consistent terminology (MSA/SA) to improve AI agent understanding of available data.

message: Operation 'get-zipc-v1' has semantic quality issues: vague_summary, vague_description, unclear_purpose, missing_output_details. Original summary uses 'License Key' which is inconsistent with API context terminology ('subscription-key'). Description is too terse and doesn't explain the purpose or use case. Enhanced summary to use consistent terminology and clarify the authentication validation action. Expanded description to explain the operation's purpose (health check), expected behavior (204 on success), error conditions, and practical use case for AI agents.

data.current_description: Endpoint used to validate license key only. Returns 204 on Success
data.description_suggestion: Validates the provided API subscription key (license key) to verify authentication and API access. This is a health check endpoint that confirms the API key is valid and active. Returns HTTP 204 No Content on successful validation, or an error response if the key is invalid or expired. Useful for verifying credentials before executing other operations.
data.reasoning: Original summary uses 'License Key' which is inconsistent with API context terminology ('subscription-key'). Description is too terse and doesn't explain the purpose or use case. Enhanced summary to use consistent terminology and clarify the authentication validation action. Expanded description to explain the operation's purpose (health check), expected behavior (204 on success), error conditions, and practical use case for AI agents.
